testimonials.name: Alana Luckraft
testimonials.company: London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine
testimonials.testimonial: It was a pleasure to work with Damian on our project to develop a KPI dashboard to monitor progress with our new strategy. Damian is knowledgeable and experienced in all things Power BI and worked professionally, efficiently, and patiently to meet our requirements. The result was a comprehensive, high-quality and visually engaging dashboard for our stakeholders. I look forward to working with Damian again.

testimonials.name: Guy Pattison
testimonials.position: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst,Strategic Planning and Change
testimonials.testimonial: Damian provided exceptional technical knowledge and flexibility to deliver our ambitious project. He adapted to all our bespoke requirements and created out of the box and seamless solutions to any problems that arose throughout the development.

testimonials.name: Iaian Sherwell
testimonials.position: VP, Business Modeling, Reporting and Analytics
testimonials.testimonial: Damian was a great team player. He got the balance if innovation and delivery spot on. He was good at managing expectations to ensure we delivered on time.

testimonials.name: Davoc Bradley
testimonials.testimonial: The work performed revolutionised our ability to provide high quality, consistent BI to run the business; something we hadn't achieved in years was achieved in just 6 months, couldn't recommend Damian's work enough!

testimonials.name: Cydnie Bedwell
testimonials.testimonial: Damian was hired to support our businesses with creating reports that allow us to instantly identify drops in performance, areas of high performance, trends and effective use of our CRM system. He's created this for us in a short period of time and has done so in a way that makes our reports universally understandable and quick to digest. From a business who have never had this type of data before, nor are we the techiest bunch, Damian has made this entire project seamless and simple, ensuring he explains it all to us along the way. I'd highly recommend hiring Damian to be a part of your team or to support you with a project- he's been a pleasure to have onboard

testimonials.name: Paul King
testimonials.company: University of the West of England
testimonials.testimonial: We have been fortunate enough to work with Damian over the last year or so and have found his approach and enthusiasm a breath of fresh air. Until we engaged with Damian we had struggled to find a Power BI specialist that was able to understand our needs fully, get to grips with our current data and turn that into reporting that we could rely on. His ability to understand quickly, and ask clarifying questions when needed, made it really easy to trust the process with him. Damian's is always clear when setting expectations and works through unexpected issues well. We have been so happy with his work that we continue to work with him and recommend him for work with our clients.
